metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2150 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
xfs_metadump in xfsprogs before 3.2.4 does not properly obfuscate file data, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by reading a generated image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2150` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xfsprogs - 4.3.0+nmu1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xfsprogs package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0+nmu1ubuntu1').
